TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IpcChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class IpcChannel Implements IChannelReceiver, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type IpcChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelSender interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 提供使用 IPC 协议传输消息的信道实现。

span.span: Provides a channel implementation that uses the IPC protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] The.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用通道传输远程调用。Channels are used by the.NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端调用远程对象时, 调用将被序列化为客户端通道发送并由服务器通道接收的消息。When a client calls a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 收到消息后, 将对其进行反序列化和处理。After the message is received, it is deserialized and processed. 任何返回值由服务器通道传输并由客户端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 类是一个便捷的类, 它将类和类的功能结合起来。 The class is a convenience class combining the functionality of the class and the class. > [!CAUTION] > 在`exclusiveAddressUse` 参数`properties`中将属性`false`设置为时, 可以为同一个命名管道注册多个对象。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在这种情况下, 请求可以到达注册的任何通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 仅当同时使用 ALCs 时, 才会将此设置视为安全设置。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用设置远程处理服务器及其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 该示例包含三个部分:The example contains three parts: - 服务器A server - 客户端A client - 服务器和客户端使用的远程对象。A remote object used by the server and the client. 下面的代码示例演示了一个服务器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/server.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/server.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例演示了此服务器的客户端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/client.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/client.cs#20)] 下面的代码示例显示了服务器和客户端使用的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/common.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/common.cs#30)]

summary.span: 使用指定的配置属性和接收器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息, 请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 信道接收器提供了一个插件点, 该插件点允许访问流过通道的基础消息, 以及用于将消息发送到远程对象的传输机制所使用的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收器还负责在客户端和服务器之间传输消息。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 通道接收器在链中链接在一起, 并且所有通道消息在最终序列化并传输消息之前都流过此接收器链。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果不需要接收器功能, 请将`clientSinkProvider`和`serverSinkProvider`参数设置为`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`. > [!CAUTION] > 在`exclusiveAddressUse` 参数`properties`中将属性`false`设置为时, 可以为同一个命名管道注册多个对象。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在这种情况下, 请求可以到达注册的任何通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 仅当同时使用 ALCs 时, 才会将此设置视为安全设置。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/server2.cs#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的通道都具有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 此名称用于在调用时检索特定通道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . 默认名称为 "ipc"。The default name is "ipc". ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 将消息传递给指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回将消息传递到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or channel data object. 如果参数为`null` ,`remoteChannelData`则将用作接收器的目标。 `uri`If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 或参数可以为, 但`null`不能同时为两者。 `remoteChannelData` `url`Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. 信道接收器提供了一个插件点, 该插件点允许访问流过通道的基础消息, 以及用于将消息发送到远程对象的传输机制所使用的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收器在链`ChannelSinkProviders`中链接在一起, 并且所有通道消息都流过此接收器链, 然后才会序列化并传输消息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of `ChannelSinkProviders` and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/client.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/client.cs#22)]

summary.span: 指示当前信道开始侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无需调用此方法即可开始在新初始化的通道上进行侦听。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 在调用方法后, 使用此方法重新启动对通道的侦听。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called. `data`参数可用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果你不希望将特定状态传递到通道, 请将设置`data`为。 `null`If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void StopListening (object data);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed
Public Sub StopListening (data As Object)
public: virtual void StopListening(System::Object ^ data);
abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 该信道的可选状态信息。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示当前信道停止侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法停止在通道上进行侦听。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新启动侦听, 请使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. `data`参数可用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果你不希望将特定状态传递到通道, 请将设置`data`为。 `null`If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
